name: Horse Chain
desc: <blue>On Hold:</>User increases Hit/Avoid based on unit's internal level, Horse units only.

name: The Fool's Ring
desc:
Its users wanders trough life without a care about safety, only focusing on the way foward.
-99%HP and 99%HP Growth, the user gains vantage, desperation; Astra+ and Absolute counter.

name: Dark Suit
desc: <blue>On Hold:</>Unit gains +1% in most stats for every enemy killed until end of chapter, but is always afflicted by Shadowblight and all weapons are considered Dark.

desc: <blue>On Hold:</>Attacks inflict Stun, +50% damage against Stunned enemies, but user can no longer counterattack.

desc:
"Just parry it lmao"

icon_nid: {Tactics Ogre LUCT, EldritchAbo, serebii01} Item Icon Sheet 2b

name: Plushie Tag
desc:
Stick it on your friend or throw it on the grount for instant marketability. (Soaking and throwing against a wall is optional).
Gives ally Plushie for 3 turns.
Unit cannot use weapons, doubles HP, -50 Avoid, Provoke, and 100% HP Regen while has Plushie status.
Or throw it to make a plushie decoy.
Item created by Haunted Axe/Memae.

name: Plushie Tag
desc:
Gives ally Plushie for 3 turns. <green>CD:5</>
Unit cannot use weapons, doubles HP, -50 Avoid, Provoke, and 100% HP Regen while has Plushie status.
Item created by Haunted Axe/Memae.

name: Summon Plushie
desc:
Creates a plushie decoy that distracts enemies, this is a free action. <green>CD:5</>
Note: Summon fails if current Plushie is alive on the field.
Item created by Haunted Axe/Memae.

name: Thief Cape
desc: Thieves only. Unit can use Reposition, Draw Back and Shove.

name: Reposition
desc: Moves targeted ally to other side of user.

name: Draw Back
desc: Moves user one space from targeted ally, then moves targeted ally into user's previous space.

name: Shove
desc: Pushes an adjacent allied unit one square away.

name: Vallite Lance

<violet>Inflicts:</><icon>Drenched</>(AOE:3)
<red>Effective:</><icon>Dragon</>
<pink>Misc:</>STR + SKL/2 (<red>{e:(unit.get_stat('STR') + (unit.get_stat('SKL')//2))}</>).
